QuestData.Title: Pterrible Ptorment
QuestData.Description:
One of the trolls' skyscreamers in Za'Tual is undergoing a ritual of torture, its will being bent forever to serve its masters.
Kill those that inflict such torment on the creature and we can only hope that it will return to the skies.
QuestData.RewardText: I hope that creature has the intelligence necessary to know who saved it. It seems to me that it would be a dangerous foe if provoked.
